node.title: Former Haven-X Talent Roza Coatl Join 4V Live Talent Roster
node.description: Roza Coatl, formerly a VTuber talent from the now disbanded agency Haven-X, is officially joining the VTuber talent roster of 4V Live, a US-based agency. Coatl previously announced her departure from Haven-X on July 11 due to health concerns.
